sentences.sContent: a puritanical father who wouldn’t let his children watch television
sentences.sCn: 不让孩子看电视的清教徒式的父亲

sentences.sContent: The atmosphere at the school was oppressively puritanical.
sentences.sCn: 那所学校是清教徒式的风气，显得很压抑。

remMethod.val: puritan(清教徒) + ical → 如清教徒的 → 极守道德的

trans.tranOther: very strict about moral matters, especially sex – used in order to show disapproval
